snippet.title: The Alliance Alive HD Remastered - Launch Trailer (PS4, Nintendo Switch)
snippet.description:
Out Now!
Learn more @ https://nisamerica.com/games/alliance-alive

The world has been overtaken by Daemons from another realm, and humanity has been subjugated. To reclaim their home and free their people, a group of unlikely heroes must band together and ignite a revolution. Explore various Daemon-controlled realms, awaken your inner strength in the heat of battle, and form alliances to amass a force strong enough to stand against the invading forces.

Available NOW for Nintendo Switch and PlayStation 4. PC release date to be announced at a later time.
